description.name: Khalti Payment Gateway
description.tagline: Enhanced Khalti Payment Gateway Module for WHMCS
description.long: This enhanced module integrates the Khalti Payment Gateway into WHMCS, offering seamless payment processing directly through the Khalti Wallet. It's a forked and upgraded version of the official Khalti Plugin, providing additional features and improved functionality.
features: Seamless WHMCS Integration: Easily integrates with your WHMCS platform, ensuring smooth setup and compatibility.
Secure Payments via Khalti Wallet: Accept payments directly through the Khalti Wallet, providing a trusted and secure payment option.
Direct Refund Processing: Process refunds quickly and efficiently from within WHMCS without needing to navigate multiple platforms.
Enhanced and Optimized Module: Forked and enhanced from the official Khalti Plugin, offering additional features and improved functionality.
